name: Barrel Boot Camp
description:
In Barrel Boot Camp, you'll compete against players from all around the world to get the highest score on 12 different courses.

Get the highest score by shooting all the barrels as quickly as possible, and with as few shots as possible.

Features:
-19 Steam achievements
-Full Steam leaderboard integration
-Controller support for aiming and movement in courses
-Four different stages (maps), each with three courses
-In-menu gameplay instructions and scoring breakdown
-High quality graphics, sound effects, music, and ambience
-Full settings configuration
-Customization options including high-visibility fullbright barrels and sliders to control the RGB color of barrels
-Barrels, lots of barrels

Coming soon:
-Localization options
-More features
-More courses
